file_content.text: We'll hold this landing zone, just in case.
I put Lemda on a shuttle back to Shalim. She'll meet you there.
Be careful out there. I hope you find Lemda alive.
Master Jedi, I've never... those Regulators... you're incredible!
The Regulators didn't stand a chance against Havoc Squad, Major!
I didn't know anyone could shoot that fast! The Regulators never had a chance!
We did it... we did it! The Regulators never knew what hit them!
I'll drink to that, Slick. Those mercs will think twice about hitting us again. We owe you one.
The mercenaries hoped to overwhelm us. I only held them off thanks to your support.
I couldn't have done it alone.
You're making Slick blush, Master Jedi.
You could have run, but you held your ground and defended a greater cause. That's heroism.
You showed great courage.
We're in this for Makeb, Master Jedi. Backing down's not an option.
Knowing your people had my back made things a lot easier. You've got a solid team.
You did your part, too.
"Solid" might be generous--but we're doing our best, Major.
Saving people's sort of my second job. Actually, it's more of a hobby. Doesn't pay as well as you'd think.
I get that a lot.
If it did, I bet you could retire.
You boys have any leads on Lemda, our missing geophysicist? She's the reason we're all here.
Let's find Shalim's niece.
We fought off the first wave, but that doesn't mean those mercenaries won't return with a bigger force.
The Regulators may come back.
If they try again, Slick'll give them what for. Right?
S--sure!
Shalim sent you to find Lemda, right? Bring back his geo-whatever niece and her research? We haven't had much luck there.
Her camp site was ransacked. The Regulators must have already captured her and confiscated all the research data. Shalim's right--she found something important.
This just became a rescue mission. If the Regulators have Lemda, where would they take her?
We'll find her, somehow.
You really think they took her alive? Those mercenaries seem like the type to shoot her on sight.
They wouldn't just kill her?
The Regulators don't clean up after themselves. If they'd killed Lemda, we would've found a body. My gut says she's still alive.
She might have escaped on foot before the mercenaries hit her camp.
Could she be on the run?
Maybe, but then why hasn't she contacted us for help?
Scanners indicate no one except you has landed on or left the mesa since the Regulators came. That means she's still here, probably at one of their camps.
Great. There's half a dozen camps and no way to pinpoint which one she's at. Have to keep hitting them until she turns up.
I wasn't planning to let the Regulators stay on this mesa. One way or another, I'll find Lemda.
I'll hit every enemy camp.
Those mercenaries sure will be surprised when you show up to ruin their day.
When I assault those camps, the Regulators attacking here will fall back to reinforce their camps.
I'll take their focus off you.
Good--we could use a breather.
Assaulting enemy camps in hostile territory to rescue a hostage? That's right up Havoc Squad's alley.
This is my kind of mission.
You're like one of those holovid heroes.
The way this usually works, she'll be in the last place I look. But you never know--might luck out on the first try.
I'm feeling lucky.
How do you stay so cheerful about everything?
How big and well-defended are the mercenary camps? I'm guessing our enemies aren't sitting around roasting brawballos and singing.
Describe the enemy positions.
All we know is, the Regulators dropped a whole mess of men here with who-knows-what firepower.
If you think I'll do all the fighting while you people sit here taking it easy, you're nuts!
I'm not fighting them alone!
We'll do what we can, but we barely have enough people to hold this landing zone.
A few of our search parties never made it back. You find any other prisoners, send them here.
Someone here might know how to slice the Regulators' comm frequency and find out what they're doing. Ask around, Prosk.
We'll hold this landing zone as long as it takes. Good luck.
The mercs are coming! Find a barricade! Quick!
Shalim Avesta sent us. You're in charge here?
Reinforcements! We're saved!
Prosk, come here! It's a Jedi!
Prosk! Havoc Squad's here!
Prosk! It's... just get over here!
Prosk! Prosk! They're here!
Speak up, Lane--not sure the whole mesa heard you. My name's Prosk, in case Slick here didn't enunciate clearly.
Kid's an accountant. Barely knows which way to point a blaster. Can't say I'm much better. Used to be a mining foreman.
We've set up barricades, but they're not doing much against the Regulators. What's the plan, boss?
When they charge, hold your ground and follow my lightsaber.
Rally to me.
We'll do our best, Master Jedi!
I will stand between you and harm. The power of the Force will protect us.
We'll deflect their attacks.
I sure hope so, Master Jedi.
Ready your blasters and take cover. Don't stop firing until those mercs are on the run.
Get to your stations.
You heard the major. We can do this.
Just keep firing until all the bad guys fall down. It helps if you aim, but that really isn't necessary if there's enough targets.
Follow my lead.
Keep an eye on this one, Slick. Might learn something.
What are we up against here? Have you seen the Regulator forces?
How tough is the enemy?
There's a lot of them. They're mean and well armed. We didn't introduce ourselves.
If you can't tell the difference between friend and foe, holster your weapon and lie on the ground until this is over.
Try not to shoot me.
Why are you looking at me?
Scouts report Regulators headed this way. Big group!
Everyone's manning a barricade. Uh... find one and dig in?
What're we gonna do? They've got us surrounded!
They're gonna hit us again! Here they come!
Slick takes charge with his big brain. On it, boss.
